^(?:Fire II in Red|Aero II in Green|Water II in Blue|Blizzard II in Cyan|Stone II in Yellow|Thunder II in Magenta)$

Trigger.Name: PCT Gauge
Trigger.Description:
^(?<type>31)\|(?<timestamp>[^|]*)\|(?<id>[^|]*)\|(?<data0>[^|]*)\|(?<data1>[^|]*)\|(?<data2>[^|]*)\|(?<data3>[^|]*)\|
plugin/CactbotEventSource/FFXIVProcessIntl.cs data0 is 4 offsets 00(offset2) 00(offset1) 00(offset0) 00(job number)
data1 is 4 offsets 00(offset6) 00(offset5) 00(offset4) 00(offset3)
Presumably pattern continues from here

Trigger.Name: PCT Actions
